page.title: 13Hobbies
page.content: I found out what children did in their spare time.Boys were Riding their BMX bikes,Watching television,Playing Transformers and Comic reading. Transformers are toys which change into two things.One thing is a robot with weapons while the other thing could be a plane,cassette, lorry,car or even an insect.Marvel has published a comic called The Transformers with a Transformer story in it.Children get the comic and then they make their toys fight battles like the story in the comic.They have replaced the Star Wars toys that we all played with a couple of years ago.Comic reading is still popular with boys the favorite comic being "The Transformers."Girls enjoy Riding their bikes,Watching television,Sewing and Horse riding with several girls owning their own horses.
